tool_description:
This API provides latest NAV as well as Historic Data of Mutual Fund Schemes with response time in milliseconds.
1. Get NAV based on scheme Codes and dates - multiple entries supported
2. Get Unique Schemes for scheme suggestion API
3. Get latest nav based on schemes Codes - multiple scheme codes supported.
4. Latest business News
name: Mutual Fund Nav Info and Historic Data
title: Mutual Fund Nav Info and Historic Data
tool_name: Mutual Fund Nav Info and Historic Data

api_list.name: Get Latest business News
Get Scheme NAV using schemeCode and date - single schemeCode supported
api_list.description: Get Scheme NAV using schemeCode(AMFI Scheme Code) and date - single schemeCode supported
